unnormalised: Hey guys, regarding pesticide usage, remember the farmer suicides in Vidarbha back in '06? Scary stuff. My granddad in Kerala used to say, "less is more." Maybe we should explore alternatives like neem oil, like they suggested at the IARI workshop on 26/01/2023. Need better training for farmers, and easier access to organic options, by 10/07/2024! Also, pesticide testing must be strengthened and implemented by 11:00 hrs next Tuesday.
normalised: Hey guys, regarding pesticide usage, remember the farmer suicides in Vidarbha back in two thousand and six? Scary stuff. My granddad in Kerala used to say, "less is more." Maybe we should explore alternatives like neem oil, like they suggested at the I A R I workshop on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three. Need better training for farmers, and easier access to organic options, by tenth july two thousand and twenty four! Also, pesticide testing must be strengthened and implemented by eleven zero zero hours next Tuesday.
